item.title: How To Change Git Remote Origin
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. Change Git Remote URL The git remote set-url command changes an existing remote repository URL. The git remote set-url command takes two arguments: An existing remote name. For example, origin or upstream are two common choices. A new URL for the remote. For example:
